resources.string: Change language and colors for the app and widgets
Select your notifications and reminders settings
Fajr and Sahoor wake up alarm settings
Adjust the silent mode settings for each prayer
Prayer notification settings for each prayer
Link notifications to a system sound type.\nPreferably use alarm type to notify on silent
Clear the notification after a given time
Iqama reminder settings for each prayer
Reminder that prayer is about to start
Link reminders to a system sound type.\nPreferably use alarm type to remind on silent
Clear the reminder after a given time
Activate vibration for notifications and reminders
Activate LED notification for notifications and reminders
Different methods to calculate Fajr and Isha prayers
Only for high Latitudes, to calculate Fajr and Isha by dividing the night into parts based on the selected calculation method.\nNot compatible with Umm Al-Qura method
Add 30 minutes to Isha time during Ramadan in Umm Al-Qura method
The method to calculate Asr prayer
1 hour adjustment to set summer time (DST)
Input the appropriate time for Jumuah prayer
Activate the automatic Umm al-Qura Calendar provided by Google.\nOnlyfor Android 7.0 and above
Change numbers language in the app.\nMight not be supported on some devices
Change main app font.\nSome devices don\'t support all fonts
Colors of the widget that shows all prayer times

Colors of te horizontal widget that shows all prayer times
Colors of the big widget that shows the time to next prayer

When this alarm goes off, Fajr notification and reminder sounds will be ignored until the alarm stops
Turn Screen on when the alarm starts
Turn silent mode off temporarily before the alarm starts if the device was on Silent or Vibrate, then return it back after it stops
Stop the alarm after a given time
Set the start time of silent mode and its duration for each prayer
Vibrate once when switching from or to silent mode
Show a message when switching from or to silent mode

Restore or delete locations from SD card

Before modifying times, make sure to select the best settings for your area, and choose the correct Time Zone from device settings

No tone selected from SD card
Wake Up! Fajr prayer is near
The device is set on silent mode

This device has no gps equipment
Settings will be deleted, and reset back to defaults.
Your current location was not found so the app will use the last known location on the device.\nIf it was wrong, try again agter restarting the device.
The device couldn\'t detect your location.\nTry another method or restart the device.
Hijri calendar is adjusted from settings!

Do you want to add the app as an execption in the Battery Optimaization list to help it deliver notifications and switch to silent on time while the device is in standby mode?\n\nYou can change this later from the device\'s Battery settings.
The limits of date conversion:\nFrom 14 March 1937 CE,\nto 16 November 2077 CE
Do you want to add current location to saved locations ?
Maximum number of locations is five!
You have to set a name for current location first!
Are you sure you want to exit without saving the new data?
Choose one of the update methods first

Save the time you prefer, so that any Qur\'an is constantly sent without messages in the form of messages.

Alloxumma Solli A\'la Sayyidina Muhammadin and A\'la A\'li Sayyidina Muhammad
Assalamu alaykum wa rahmatullahi wa barakotux

The location is not ready, press the button again.
The direction of the Kaaba is from the north:
Please turn on Location and press the button again.
Three types of Qur\'an Original, Recitation, Prayer Books, Daily Prayers

The application includes 5 different languages, 2 different digital languages, 2 different topics. the ability to select and change the tone of notifications
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
No documents required? Do you download?
GPS is off, turn on GPS and allow the app to use the service. Or the program does not work properly.
A GPS-enabled device is required for the mosque detection device to work.
Website not found, please open the website and allow the application to use the website and the Internet.
There is no internet connection and the program does not work properly
Site not found, please open the site and allow the application to use the site and the Internet.
The data was not retrieved from the server
The data was not retrieved from the server
Please turn on the Internet, otherwise the program will not work properly.
If it is incorrect, adjust your system (calibration)
An unknown error will be corrected soon
